model.ball

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ball.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver<IBallCmd>

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver<IBallCmd>
    The class of ball object which behaves using a strategy object.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuhui Tong, Haoyuan Yue
